Detailed Description

A glasspane collects graphical objects which stay above all windows (e. g. a battery-indicator or a mouse-pointer). A graphical object is described by a pane-object.
See also:
PaneObject

void GlassPane::Draw (  DeviceContext *  dc  )  const [virtual]
 

Draws all pane-object which have been added to the glass-pane. The drawing is not done if GlassPane::IsEnabled returns FALSE.
